The last update was `r Sys.time()`

Here are some palmer penguins stats.

```{r, setup}
library(ggplot2)
config <- config::get()

set.seed(102888)
df <- palmerpenguins::penguins |>
  tidyr::drop_na() |>
  dplyr::slice_sample(
    prop = config$sample_frac
  )
```

This report was created using the `r config$config_name` configuration, it uses `r nrow(df)` data points.

```{r}
#| message: false

df |>
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = flipper_length_mm,
      y = body_mass_g,
      color = species
    )
  ) +
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth(
    aes(group = species), 
  ) +
  theme_bw() +
  xlab("Flipper Length (mm)") +
  ylab("Body Mass (g)") +
  ggtitle("Penguin Flipper Length vs Body Mass") +
  labs(color = "Species")
```
